intro.1: Founded in 1983, YU HWA started by producing core textile components such as ceramic guides and tension parts, earning strong trust through quality and precision.
intro.2: As smart manufacturing emerged, we pivoted toward sensor development, PLC integration, and central control systems, becoming a solution provider for automation and quality monitoring.
intro.3: We believe innovation and expertise are the keys to creating value for clients and advancing the digital transformation of the textile industry.
